website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and brightly-colored option from a reputable brand in the soccer industry.
pros: Synthetic leather upper is lightweight but durable
Specifically designed for maximum traction and speed on firm ground
The bright pink rubber studs will stand out in a crowd
Fits securely and true to size
cons: Their all-white design means they look dirty more easily, but users say they clean up well

customer_reviews.title: Everyone else seems to like them, we didn't...
customer_reviews.text: A little overpriced in my opinion. They are cute, but that's about it. There is no extra foot cushioning at all. My teenage daughter says they really hurt her feet and are uncomfortable. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper22

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why people are saying these run small. I am always a size 9 and these did not fit, they were too big. I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Winters

customer_reviews.title: I see why they are a best seller
customer_reviews.text: They are cleats and cleats are not comfort shoes or runners. With that being said they are a bit narrow and after reading the reviews I bought 1/2 size up and it seems to have compensated.
customer_reviews.author: BPY1

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this shoe for a community flag football league summer for adults. Its working just fine for me. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: miraichichi

customer_reviews.title: My daughtger likes these cleats for field hockey very much.
customer_reviews.text: My daughtger likes these cleats for field hockey very much. Much better price than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter normally wears size 6-6.5. I bought size 7 for her and these cleats are still too narrow with socks on while she has 1/2 inches extra room in front of her toes. She prefers the Nike tiempo fitting which is wider and more comfortable for her.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking cleats, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for slow pitch softball and kickball. These cleats work perfectly for both. I'm normally a 9.5 women in shoes but ordered a 10 since ADIDAS normally run a half size small and they fit perfectly! Very comfortable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Hettinger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my daughter who plays soccer, she’s picky about footwear and right off the bat found these shoes to be very comfortable. She wore them for a game and had no complaints, they didn’t require breaking-in. We’re pleased with the overall fit, comfort and support!
customer_reviews.author: L. Azan Kung

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says that they're comfortable and the fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bee C.

customer_reviews.title: Run very small but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter wears a size 7 tennis shoe. We had to go up to an 8 1/2 on these. She loves them as they are comfortable but order a few sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much I ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked these so much that I ordered a second pair. It is very hard to find shoes that she likes and for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes larger than what you wear!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 pairs and they are both too small. For a child who normally wears an 8, at least a 9 is needed. Also for no obvious reason, the size 9 is not Available with prime and shipping is $10.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always complains about her soccer cleats. She likes these and has stopped complaining. I noticed 2 other girls on her soccer team have them as well. So they must be good.
customer_reviews.author: gwat

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of cleats
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but my wife the one that actually use it and from my soccer experience - I felt the material is kind of light, but she like it (probably because of color) but I don't know,
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Size medium for my 11 year old daughter perfect. She wears a size 5 1/2 in women’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Works for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had these a week or so. The delivery was promised on Monday, then shifted to Tuesday. So far so good for my 14yo's soccer practices and game this week.
customer_reviews.author: BoneWizzo

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I play girls flag football I needed some cleats that would work for half a season because my other ones were too worn down. These cleats worked great! My only issue was the lack of support on the ankle. I twisted it one or two times because the cleat wasn't tight enough around that area but otherwise they were great. They look exactly like the picture and they are true to size. I highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Macey Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter likes them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for grad daughter to play soccer, she loves them. Says she can run faster now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Bess

customer_reviews.title: No BLISTERS
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and wore them in TWO back to back games for an adult league and escaped, remarkably, without blisters!
customer_reviews.author: MAV

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: These work well on turf. I use them for flag football. The tongue of the show is a little thin and makes tightening them a little uncomfortable at times. I’m happy with them for the price and the color makes it look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My 7th grade daughter loved these, as did many others because I saw a lot of them on the field this year! As usual, Adidas has top quality when it comes to boots. They fit well and are still in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Needed these for flag football last minute. Shipped within the 2 days. Narrow type of shoe. I’m a 9-9.5 in regular shoes. These I got in 9.5 and had to wear two socks.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin Pfefferkorn

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are good shoes. I typically wear a 9-9.5 but ordered a 10 in these and found that they were a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: hailey

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these sleek adidas
customer_reviews.text: I am new to cleats and the ones I’ve tried on in stores all disappointed. I ordered these because the price is great for something I use rarely. My only suggestion would to be get some cushioned insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M Elliott

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These don't have any cushion or support. If you buy them, plan on buying an insole.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has no complaints. She says They are comfy and fit great
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Good soccer cleat
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an identical existing pair, didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Fishers

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had many brands over the years and these are her favorite. Great comfort, great colors, and great price point.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMiko

customer_reviews.title: Order One Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up than what I normally wear after reading the other reviews for this product, and the shoes that arrived fit a bit snug but were still comfortable enough. Now that they're broken in, I find them to be very comfortable. For someone who casually plays sports, these shoes are a good, reliable option.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be very nice. We've occasionally had issues with lower quality Adidas ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be very nice. We've occasionally had issues with lower quality Adidas but these are great; the daughter (who plays a ton) is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David L Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says they're a little snug but she does have big feet
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: not good at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for kickball and they're very uncomfortable I bought them and ended up getting injured due to the lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: JuciiGlamLLC .

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cleats with Prime Wardrobe so that we could get a definite size. The process was surprisingly easy and as advertised. These are great cleats for girls who wear a size bigger than kids. Great purchase! Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat that fits more like a normal sneaker than skinny cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fits as we have come to expect from both cleats and the brand. Size up at least a half size, but at least they're not ridiculously narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Rhela

customer_reviews.title: Great but to big
customer_reviews.text: These kleets are great but a little to big I can slip them on without untieing
customer_reviews.author: Helen Nerviano

customer_reviews.title: 2 different size
customer_reviews.text: I got these cleats for my daughter. After unboxing I noticed I got two different sizes. One cleat is a size 8 and the other is a size 7 1/2. I’m very disappointed. My daughter needs them right away and I don’t have time to send back and exchange this.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 kids

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a soccer club, so I'm not an intense player, but for the price these shoes fit well, and are very comfortable to play in!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Local stores were utterly useless. Almost no selections for girls
customer_reviews.text: Just what DD#2 needed for LaCrosse. Local stores were utterly useless. Almost no selections for girls. UGH. This shoe is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: akindofmagick

customer_reviews.title: Daughter approved
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter because she loved the color combination. She says they fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: heather g

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I purchase for my 12 years daughter for Soccer game. It fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Tunisia

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Kickball
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cleats for kickball. Honestly, I was immediately surprised to how well they fit and how comfortable they are. I got tons of compliments wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Msnarora

customer_reviews.title: They fit wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter. She's had no issues with any sore areas. They fit wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect gift for my friend it fitted perfect thank you
customer_reviews.author: Real-queen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with shoes!
customer_reviews.text: 12 Yr old daughter playing soccer. Shoes have preformed well. Got dirty... but that was expected. Have held up well though out the season. :)
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer cleat!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these shoes! Work wonderful on the soccer field!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: nice looking boots but be cautioned
customer_reviews.text: these boots have lasted 4 weeks before the surface skin has started to peel away from the sole, which means they will now start to leak water. nice looking boots but be cautioned, they are not leather and obviously they are not built to stand much use.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: true to size
customer_reviews.text: my daughter used these for field hockey.. she loves the color, very comfortable, and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect soccer shoes. I recommend taking 1/2 size bigger just because those type of shoes are traditionally tighter and in order to be comfortable it is always better slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These soccer shoes were for my daughter. They fit will and have held up great after a season of soccer,
customer_reviews.author: Joni Wilson

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: fit perfectly but hurt the first couple times you wear them until you break them in, but that happens with all to most shoes so besides that i love them and get so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 and has big feet. These shoes fit her great and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved the color scheme and they were priced right.
customer_reviews.author: CVH

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size the 7.5
customer_reviews.text: The 7.5 was too small but we ordered the next size up. Keeping the same brand of shoe. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Cleats
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for two years and they still are holding up pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Lane Colquett

customer_reviews.title: Solid Soccer Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for bar league soccer. Scored a hat trick my first time wearing them. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: There really cute they don't have too much support though but if you are a forward or outfielder these are great lightweight shoes good for running.
customer_reviews.author: Adeline Cole

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, still wear them but if you have slightly wider feet go up a
customer_reviews.author: JackieP3

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fitted a little too snug at first but later loosened up. It's very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Anane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked great we just ordered a size too small. My daughters feet grew overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna Welkowsky

customer_reviews.title: ... to small but after the first day they were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning they seemed a little bit to small but after the first day they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's such a beautiful shoe!!! I love it so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, the width is wider by your toes!!! A good purchase for buying soccer shoes for the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Tongue can wear on your leg! Otherwise nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Made well and look nice. However, after a few practices & games, my daughter complained that the tongue was rubbing her lower leg- and started to hurt (her). For this reason she stopped wearing these shoes. A shame- this never happened with Adidas before.
customer_reviews.author: DaveG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this and she loves it. The store didn’t have her size.
customer_reviews.author: Fariha Shamsi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit perfectly and are true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoes! fit just as expected and were very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, responsive shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Light weight, good touch and tons of flexibility. Plus the colors are fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe odor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, but we had an issue with shoe odor. Another family that purchased the same shoes also had the same issue and it's to the point that our daughter needs to store them in zip lock bags after use, to keep them from smelling up the whole house. We have been through several pair of cleats and have never had this issue before, and have never had this issue with any of her other shoes either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect size 6 order the same
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cleats! I tried them on and fit perfect for my size. Same color
customer_reviews.author: Vanefdz599

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and comfortable. Great fit for my daughter!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H.

customer_reviews.title: TD Maker.
customer_reviews.text: My gf wears these for mix flag football. She averages 4 catches a game and caught a slant the other day and run it 20 yards for a TD. And they look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Over Here the II

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I could not find this size local and was so grateful to find these online. Fair price and they fit my daughter perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: mbrock

customer_reviews.title: To small nothing was wrong with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes was to tight on the toes need a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Holmes

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Goletto VI FG W Soccer Shoe
product_meta.description: Add speed to your game in these women's Soccer cleats primed to play fast. Designed with a classic look, they feature a lightweight, durable synthetic upper for all-game comfort. Made for stability and speed on firm ground.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Flexible ground outsole for maximum traction on firm ground (dry natural grass)
